title: Catalytic Pathways for Efficient Ammonia-to-Hydrogen Towards a Sustainable Energy Future
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01029A, Review Article
M. Nasiruzzaman Shaikh, Mohammad Usman, Ahsan Ali, Zain Hassan Yamani
A sustainable and smooth transition from fossil-fuel-based energy to a clean hydrogen economy requires affordable hydrogen storage and transportation solutions. Ammonia is a desirable option for hydrogen carriers due to...
